title: Rito servers down/ stuck in champ select/ stuck in game gg hackers are op or riot is op
body: the servers are down again guys look like we are all here on the forums to talk and share our thoughts about the game life and the champs we all love and hate.

replies.body: it was a dark and stormy night.... riot turned back on one for all mode.... but the only champions available were {{champion:6}}  and {{champion:40}}
and looks like no ones help me gtfo of the reconnecting screen then
same issue here...cant connect to server and stuck in reconnect page,and it said an unknown error has occurred...riot pls
holy cow i'm stuck there too, but why doesn't riot fix it, or is it too hard, i'm so ultimate raging right freaking now omfg
Yeah right like they will tell us. This is just getting so old, when will they fix this and stop making excuses....gg hackers...gg wp
I feel you so much. Just got {{champion:238}}  too
I mean riot at least tell us ur server is down in server status
Ok so I am glad that it isn't just me then. I got kicked out and says my position que is 1 but my wait is 2 hours
yea, can't connect to the NA server at all.
What shit servers, lets see how they try to spin this around whenever they acknowledge their servers are shitting on themselves.
